channel.title: data sketches
channel.description: A Nadieh and Shirley collaboration - Creating a data visualization a month on the same topic and sharing the data, sketching and coding steps along the way

item.title: July - Movies
item.description: For our very first month we looked into movies that have a personal connection to us. For Nadieh that turned out to be a deep dive into the number of words spoken in all 3 extended editions of the Lord of the Rings. Shirley looked into the top summer movies since the year of her birth. Read more about the exact data + sketch + code that we performed in our write-up...
